about_the_game:
Can you guess the words from pictures and unlock the levels? Then try Photo Quiz - Capital Cities.

You will love this amazing new Photo Guess game. Guessing the pictures will be so much fun. you'll have endless hours of brain training unscrambling fun!
Can you Guess The Picture? What's The Picture? Countless puzzles from easy to tricky are waiting for you! New puzzles are added continuously for endless fun!

Picture Guessing Games for every level of skill. Perfect word games, travel games, trivia quizzes, puzzle games and brain teasers to challenge the whole family.

Photo Quiz - Capital Cities - See the image and guess the word! Guess The Picture will entertain you for hours!

HINTS:
- Show one random letter for 5 coins - Using this hint will bring out a random letter in the puzzle.
- Solve puzzle for 25 coins - this hint will completely solve the quiz for you!

Features:
- Guess hundreds of pictures, train your brain and hunt for stars and higher levels
- The amazing and addictive guessing game
- Beautiful Material UI
- Simple and Highly Addictive Gameplay
- Choice of 2 languages: English + Spanish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
